chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: 
When I open the camera on the back, it makes noises and is blurry

Thank you for your help,

Hello Sharan,

You can find your return label attached to this message. Your return will be handled by Chronopost. Just drop off your package at a nearby return location. You can find a list of locations here: 

Before you prepare your return, please follow these steps:
1. Check out the instructions on how to return an item at [link](https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions)
2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product
3. Remove any existing protective cover or film
4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below:

How to package your product:
• The box should be strong and stable, and your product should fit snugly in it so it won't move during transit.
• Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside for identification purposes if the original label is lost or damaged).
• Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before shipping. This will protect you in case your product gets damaged during transit.

Your return is now ready to be shipped! We'll notify you as soon as it arrives at our facility.

Best regards,
Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear ecomobile,

Please note: Customer sends device in for REFUND.

Thank you!

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request. Kindly assist the customer in returning the device. We await the arrival of the parcel.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

I hope this message finds you well. 

The customer changed her mind and send the item back for a refund. No repair is necessary. 

Here, if you should have any questions. 

Kind regards,
Tansu from Back Market

Dear ecomobile,

The customer further informed us that there is an issue with the camera. 

Kind regards,
Tansu from Back Market

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Tansu Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request. We are still proceeding with the necessary actions for a refund. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JY
